ta.title: ஜனாதிபதியில் சிறப்பு அறிக்கை
body_lines: ஜனாதிபதி அனுரா குமாரா டிசனாயக்க பந்தயத்தை உரையாற்றினார்.

en.title: Special Statement in the President
body_lines: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake addressing the race, addressing the race.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the statement in approximately 200 characters:
"President Anura Kumara Dissanayake addressed the race issue during his speech. He emphasized the importance of equality and fairness in all aspects of society."
